document_data.name: ''Key of Disruption''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/256/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Tools of the Trade|92}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Keys of disruption''''' were a variety of [[enchanted]] keys that could seal any [[lock (item)|lock]]{{Cite dragon/256/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Tools of the Trade|90}}
document_data.Powers:
When pressed into any normal lock, a ''key of disruption'' would change its size and shape to fit it perfectly. Once the key was turned, the lock would be mystically sealed and could neither be opened nor [[lockpicks|picked]] unless the same ''key of disruption'' was used to open it again. However, if the lock was that of a door, then the ''[[knock]]'' [[spell]] could be used to open it.

''Keys of disruption'' could not affect magical locks. If a wielder attempted to use a ''key of disruption'' on a magical lock, there was a chance they would be inflicted with a shock of magical energy.
document_data.Notable Owners: Most guilds in the Dalelands possessed one or more ''keys of disruption''.
